ing: 1 1/2 cups almond milk, or as needed
1 apple, cored and cut into chunks
des: "Eat breakfast like a king! This recipe is a quick on-the-go option for a healthy, filling breakfast or snack. You will be charged with energy and better able to focus on what else you have to do! Enjoy!"
ins: Blend almond milk, oats, strawberries, blueberries, clementines, apple, avocado, flax seeds, honey, coconut oil, and chia seeds together in a blender until smooth, 30 to 60 seconds.
